channel.title: Item working as another item?
channel.description:
well i doubt that title actually made alot of damn sense rofl, but anyways anyone happen to know how to make a fire staff to take place of a fire rune. ie. casting fire blast i have death and air runes and i am using fire staff
[b]any help is GREATLY appreciated[/b]

item.title: Item working as another item?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Make it check if the player has the staff or the runes, and if he has the staff equipped to not remove the fire runes.

Read full topic
